alert.note: Alert for Burnett (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 6:25PM CDT until July 27 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Burnett County in northwestern Wisconsin... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 624 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Grantsburg, or 15 miles east of Pine City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Siren. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
